channel.title: How can i direct the cache to the home directory
channel.description: how can i direct the cache to the home directory? like it looks for the cache in "c:/" how can i make it do any letter? so it looks in the home directory

item.title: How can i direct the cache to the home directory
item.dc:creator: @pasta186 pasta186
item.description:
@pasta186 wrote:

Replace the “c:/” line with this:

String as[] = {(System.getProperty("user.home")+"/")};

Read full topic
item.source: How can i direct the cache to the home directory
